short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time a bitcoin block is mined, a cat will get its jumps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What it does (aka The Most Important Extension Ever Made)

Have you ever wanted to see a cat jump up every time a Bitcoin Block is mined? 

No? 

Well, this extension does that for you! 

After installing, it will keep track of the current bitcoin block mined, and when a new block is mined...BOOM, a cat will jump and the extension will close.

(oh, and now The Cat will even run in the background and...surprise! Pop up somewhere.)
